module.tx_extbasekickstarter.settings {
	
	# cat=plugin.extbase_kickstarter - defaults//; type=boolean; label=Enable roundtrip: If true you can modify the source code of auto generated files and continue editing with the kickstarter 
	enableRoundTrip = 1
	
	classBuilder {
				
		Controller {
				# cat=plugin.extbase_kickstarter - classBuilder //; type=string; label=Parent Controller Class: The class, that all controller in an extension extend. If the class name does not start with Tx_ it will be prefixed with the current Extension key and Controller directory. 
				parentClass = Tx_Extbase_MVC_Controller_ActionController
				
		}
		
		
		Model {
				# cat=plugin.extbase_kickstarter - classBuilder //; type=string; label=Parent Entity Model Class: The class, that all model object classes in an extension extend. If the class name does not start with Tx_ it will be prefixed with the current Extension key and Domain/Model directory. 
				entityParentClass = Tx_Extbase_DomainObject_AbstractEntity
				
				# cat=plugin.extbase_kickstarter - classBuilder //; type=string; label=Parent Value Object Model Class: The class, that all model object classes in an extension extend. If the class name does not start with Tx_ it will be prefixed with the current Extension key and Domain/Model directory. 
				valueObjectParentClass = Tx_Extbase_DomainObject_AbstractValueObject
				
		}
	}
		
}
